text: A benefit concert or charity concert is a type of musical benefit performance such as concert or gala that has musicians, comedians, or other performers performing for charitable purpose. Usually this is done for a specific humanitarian crisis. They usually raise money or funds for organizations that help people during those specific crises. Benefit concerts are seen as good at gaining support and raising funds for a cause because of the large media coverage that they usually receive. ==References== Category:Charity events
title: Benefit concert
